Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 164th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2009...
Injured on 8/12/2010 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/16/2012...
Had first career hit on 5/2/2017, off Eli Alfano (STL)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/4/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $2,300,000 per year...
Injured on 5/28/2022 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/13/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
